answers.answer: My sister in law had preeclampsia and had a c-section at 32 weeks he was just under 5 lbs and has been in the nicu for two weeks. He'll probably be there for a few more days up to another week.
I had my baby at 33 weeks and she was in the nicu for 3 weeks but she only weighed 2lbs 11 oz.it really just depends on the baby and how developed the lungs are.
Thx girls was curious cuz a friend of mine sister in law gave birth to her son yesterday and she was barely 32wks

I had my daughter at 34 weeks and she was in for 2 weeks. The length of time that they stay in the nicu depends on the baby's progress. My daughter wouldn't haven't been in so long but she wasn't eating like she needed to.
Same with my sister in laws baby he cant fully eat by himself yet.

question: Anyone have their bby at 32 wks if so how long was bby in nicu?
title: question
